mdRecord.dcterms:description: Declaration of presence. Statement of encouragement. Line from "The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock." A date [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
If you get confused, just listen to the music play… | OLIVIA PEABODY WAS HERE | ”Should I, after tea & cakes & ices | Have the strength to force the moment to its crisis?” | 2/8/2013
